experience.description:
Tasks performed:
-Search for senior-level developer candidates with a complex and rare
technology stack for an international corporation working mainly in the office. 
- The main programming languages were: Java, Python, Rust, C++ and so on.
- Experience working with such recruitment automation systems as: Huntflow,
Hurma, E-staff, etc.
- The search was conducted on platforms such as Hh.ru , career.habr.com ,
telegram channels, amazinghiring.ru etc.
- Work experience as a Lead senior recruiter. Management of subordinate
employees: training and transfer of personal experience, assistance in work.
Development of a candidate search strategy, cold call algorithms and objection
handling.

industries.name: Internet Company (Search Engines, Payment Systems, Social Networks, Information and Educational, Entertainment Resources, Website Promotion etc.)

experience.company: Tomsk State University of Control Systems and Radioelectronics
experience.description:
Participation in projects:

1. Scientific research for the Federal Space Agency. "Development of a set of software and hardware tools for monitoring information highways, ensuring electromagnetic compatibility and investigating the reliability of a unified range of electronic modules based on the system-on-a-chip technology for control and power supply systems of communication, navigation and remote sensing spacecraft with a long active life."

2. Development and delivery of a hardware and software complex for analyzing the interactions of electrical signals of on-board equipment

3. Development of a software product for providing electromagnetic compatibility devices. "TALGAT computer simulation and quasi-static analysis system”.

higher.name: PhD
higher.description: Elements and devices of computer technology and control systems

higher.name: Tomsk State University of Control Systems and Radioelectronics, Tomsk
higher.faculty: Radio Engineering Faculty, Electronic personal and property security systems
